James Erskine est parvenu à les récupérer et a décidé de les utiliser comme support à un film sur la chanteuse. Outre la voix de Billie Holiday, on entend donc celles, notamment, de Count Basie, Louis Armstrong ou encore Tony Bennett.

programme.title: The Apollo
programme.desc: L'histoire du "Apollo Theater", une célèbre salle de spectacle du quartier de Harlem, lieu emblématique de la musique et de la culture noire américaine.

programme.title: Pas son genre
programme.desc: Clément Le Guern vient de quitter sa compagne. Auteur d'essais reconnu et professeur de philosophie, Clément, très parisien, apprend avec effroi qu'il est muté à Arras. Heureusement pour lui, son emploi du temps lui permet de passer la moitié de sa semaine à Paris. Mais, dans un salon de coiffure d'Arras, il rencontre Jennifer, qui s'occupe de lui. Clément est sous le charme de cette jeune femme qui lui résiste.

programme.title: Souvenir d'une après-midi d'été
programme.desc: C'est l'été à Corte, il fait chaud. Pour passer l'après-midi, Marie, Lucas et Ghujvanni traînent à la rivière. Ils remarquent qu'un touriste dort pas très loin et se mettent en tête de lui voler son portefeuille.

programme.title: Still Walking
programme.desc: Comme chaque année pendant l'été, la famille Yokoyama se retrouve pour commémorer la mort tragique du fils aîné, décédé quinze ans plus tôt en tentant de sauver un enfant de la noyade. Chacun garde pour lui ses soucis. La fille, Chinami, ne semble guère heureuse auprès de son mari. Le fils, Ryota, cache à tous qu'il est au chômage. Et son père lui reproche son mariage avec une veuve, déjà mère d'un enfant.

programme.title: Une affaire de famille
programme.desc: À Tokyo, Osamu, ouvrier précaire dans le bâtiment, et son fils Shota s'offrent quelques croquettes dans un échoppe de rue après avoir pratiqué leur activité quotidienne et bien rodée, le vol à l'étalage dans une épicerie de leur quartier. Un soir d'hiver, Osamu et Shota découvrent Yuri une fillette transie devant chez elle et la ramènent à la maison. Ayant constaté qu'elle porte des traces de coups sur tout le corps, ils ne se résolvent pas à la rendre à ses parents. La petite Yuri devient un membre à part entière de leur communauté, qui vit d'expédients.

programme.title: Virgin Secrets
programme.desc: Melissa Moody, enceinte de plusieurs mois, vient se présenter au domicile des Chase. Elle est reçue par Charlene et Philip, la mère et le frère cadet de Ronnie, mort cinq ans plus tôt. Melissa, qui n'a connu que Ronnie, affirme que le bébé qu'elle attend est de lui. Totalement incrédule et toujours affectée par la mort de son fils, Charlene renvoie aussitôt Melissa, qui part trouver refuge chez Bill et Gail Erwin. Le couple s'occupe de la jeune femme depuis qu'elle est en froid avec ses parents, effrayés par sa crise mystique.

programme.title: Ava
programme.desc: Ava, 13 ans, passe des vacances avec sa mère, Maud, et sa petite soeur, Inès, dans l'Ouest de la France au bord de la mer. C'est sur une plage qu'elle croise pour la première fois Juan, un jeune homme en fuite accompagné d'un grand chien noir, aux prises avec la police. Le lendemain, au cours d'un rendez-vous chez un ophtalmologiste, l'adolescente apprend qu'elle va progressivement perdre la vue. Un peu plus tard, elle suit Juan, qui est interpellé par un policier dans une supérette. Ava en profite pour partir avec son chien, qu'elle baptise Loupo.

programme.title: Yves
programme.desc: Jerem, un rappeur raté, vit chez sa grand-mère en se nourrissant de pizza, bananes et autres biscuits plongés dans du lait. Contre de l'argent, il accepte de tester Yves, un frigo high tech et ultra-connecté. So, qui travaille pour la société Digital Cool, vient lui livrer la machine qui parle et qui s'occupe de tout. Elle se demande si elle a bien fait d'avoir sélectionné Jérémy, trop dilettante à son goût. De son côté, le jeune homme n'apprécie pas l'autoritarisme d'Yves concernant les courses. Quand Jérémy veut arrêter le test, Yves fait livrer des enceintes.

programme.title: You Cannot Kill David Arquette
programme.desc: Après avoir remporté le championnat du monde de lutte dans la catégorie des poids lourds en 2000, l'ancien acteur David Arquette tente l'exploit de remonter sur le ring à presque 50 ans. Ses amis et ses proches apportent leurs témoignages dans ce documentaire portrait.

programme.title: Allen v. Farrow
programme.desc: En 1992, le réalisateur Woody Allen est accusé par l'actrice Mia Farrow, son ancienne compagne, d'agressions sexuelles sur leur fille Dylan, âgée de 7 ans. Cette plongée dans les arcanes d'une affaire qui a fait les gros titres des journaux revient sur la bataille judiciaire entre les deux vedettes d'Hollywood et les controverses suscitées.

programme.title: Allen v. Farrow
programme.desc: D'après Dylan Farrow, la fille de l'actrice Mia Farrow, avec qui Woody Allen partageait alors sa vie, le célèbre cinéaste aurait abusé d'elle lorsqu'elle était enfant. Au-delà du scandale médiatique provoqué à l'époque, ce documentaire révèle l'histoire intime de l'affaire. Des images vidéo tournées par Mia, des conversations téléphoniques enregistrées par les deux parties lors du combat judiciaire pour la garde des enfants, et de nombreuses interviews de membres de la famille Farrow viennent étayer le propos.

programme.title: Allen v. Farrow
programme.desc: En 1992, le réalisateur Woody Allen est accusé par l'actrice Mia Farrow, son ancienne compagne, d'agressions sexuelles sur leur fille Dylan, âgée de 7 ans. Ce documentaire retrace toute l'affaire, médiatique et judiciaire, qui a suivi. Des pièces relatives aux procès et des documents privés étayent le propos, notamment la première audition de Dylan, que Mia Farrow considère comme une preuve de la culpabilité de Woody Allen, tandis que ce dernier y voit la preuve que Dylan a été manipulée. Mia, Dylan, son frère Ronan, ainsi que le procureur Frank Maco et de nombreux experts apportent leurs témoignages.

programme.title: Allen v. Farrow
programme.desc: La bataille judiciaire lancée au sujet des droits de garde en 1993 laisse Dylan et sa famille épuisés. Il leur faudra plusieurs années pour retrouver leur sérénité. Des décennies plus tard, alors que Woody Allen continue d'être l'un des réalisateurs les plus en vue, le développement du mouvement #MeToo et le soutien de son frère Ronan Farrow, poussent Dylan à rendre public son histoire pour la première fois.

programme.title: Le coup des larmes
programme.desc: Pour son prochain film, une actrice doit apprendre à tirer à balles réelles. Cette expérience inattendue la met plutôt mal à l'aise. L'apprentissage débute.

programme.title: Une chance sur six
programme.desc: Dans le sud de la France, Hubert Vallon, un antiquaire homosexuel, partage sa vie avec Patricia de Sarneville, une riche héritière de quinze ans son aînée. Tandis qu'elle se consacre aux œuvres caritatives, Hubert préfère les œuvres d’art et les jeux de casino. Vallon rêve de se débarrasser de son épouse. Lorsqu'il fait la connaissance de Gaëtano Campanella, flic célibataire et catholique pratiquant, vivant chez sa mère, l'attraction est immédiate. Gaëtano applique son propre code moral. Aussi machiavéliques l'un que l'autre, les deux hommes ne vont pas tarder à s'affronter.

programme.title: Holly Weed
programme.sub-title: S1 E9 En fait c'est pire

programme.title: Steak
programme.desc: Dans un pays imaginaire, en 2016, Georges retrouve son ami Blaise après sept ans de séparation. Les codes gestuels et les critères de beauté ont changé depuis leur dernière rencontre. On ne dit plus bonjour mais "bottine" et les jeunes se font refaire le visage, à l'instar des Chivers, une bande de minets très en vue. Georges décide de recourir à la chirurgie esthétique pour devenir l'un des leurs.

programme.title: Real Time with Bill Maher
programme.desc: Talk-show.

programme.title: Belgica
programme.desc: Au début des années 2000, à Gand, Jo vient d'ouvrir un bar, le Belgica. Son frère aîné, Franck, qui se sent un peu enfermé dans sa vie de mari et jeune père, propose à Jo de l'aider dans la gestion de l'établissement. Il commence à faire venir des musiciens dans le bar, qui connait vite un grand succès auprès de la clientèle locale. Si le lieu est réputé pour son ambiance survoltée, l'alcool et la drogue y circulent beaucoup, provoquant des dérapages.

programme.title: Lucky Strike
programme.desc: Jung-man, qui doit so'ccuper de sa mère malade, gagne modestement sa vie en faisant le ménage dans un sauna. Tout bascule quand il s'empare d'un gros sac de marque, trouvé dans une consigne du vestiaire et contenant une importante somme d'argent. De son côté, Tae-young, un agent des douanes, ne sait pas comment régler la dette qu'il a contractée auprès de monsieur Park, un impitoyable criminel. Mi-ran, régulièrement battu par son mari violent, ne sait pas comment faire pour s'éloigner de cet homme dangereux.

programme.title: A Dark, Dark Man
programme.desc: Dans les steppes kazakhes, la corruption est monnaie courante. Bekzat, un jeune policier rompu aux basses besognes, y participe. Ses supérieurs le chargent d’étouffer une affaire d’agressions mortelles sur des petits garçons. Sur place, Bekzat trouve le parfait coupable en la personne de Pukuar, un simplet qui traîne dans les environs. Mais l’irruption d’Ariana, une journaliste pugnace et déterminée, envoyée par le gouvernement pour assister à l’enquête, met en suspens la conclusion hâtive de l’affaire et sème bientôt le doute dans l’esprit du policier.

programme.title: Abou Leila
programme.desc: En 1994, dans une Algérie depuis plusieurs années en proie à une violente guerre civile, une fusillade éclate dans les rues d'Alger, au petit matin. Un peu plus tard, deux hommes, S. et Lotfi, sillonnent la lisière du Sahara en voiture à la recherche d'un terroriste, Abou Leila. Les deux hommes ne s'arrêtent que pour dormir dans leur voiture ou dans des hôtels bon marché. Chaque nuit, S., profondément affecté par des prises de médicaments, se réveille en sursaut après des cauchemars, cherchant frénétiquement son souffle. Il est pourtant bien plus fermement convaincu que Lotfi, qu'il leur faut traquer Abou Leila.

programme.title: Blue Valentine
programme.desc: Dean et Cindy se sont aimés dès qu'ils se sont vus. La jeune femme vivait alors une relation tumultueuse avec Bobby, son petit ami de l'époque. Dean a su la séduire et la réconforter. Des années plus tard, leur couple bat sérieusement de l'aile. Dean n'est plus que l'ombre de lui-même. Sa femme, qui le tenait en haute estime, se désole de son manque d'ambition au point qu'elle ne supporte plus sa présence.

programme.title: Thalasso
programme.desc: Cinq ans après avoir été kidnappé, l'écrivain Michel Houellebecq doit prendre soin de sa santé vacillante après trop d'excès de boisson et se rend dans un centre de thalassothérapie. Les soins, l'interdiction de fumer et le régime sans alcool obligatoires ne l'enchantent guère. Tout comme l'acteur Gérard Depardieu, patient également, et avec lequel il se lie d'amitié. Ensemble, ils boivent en cachette, se racontent des choses intimes et parlent religion, philosophie et politique. Leur séjour est chamboulé quand des amis de l'écrivain lui demandent un service.

programme.title: Succession

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A Hongkong, J.S. Cheung, officier de police spécialiste du déminage et des explosifs, a depuis longtemps infiltré le gang du redoutable Peng Hong, qui multiplie les braquages hautement préparés. Pour leur nouveau coup, les gangsters ont mis en place un dispositifs de taxis piégés, leur permettant de détourner l'attention des forces de l'ordre. Alors que les braqueurs sèment le chaos, Cheung, dans un de leurs véhicule, fait tout pour les empêcher de nuire. Ce faisant, il parvient à arrêter le jeune frère de Peng Hong alors que celui-ci parvient à prendre la fuite.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A New York, en 1933, le cinéaste Carl Denham engage la jeune actrice Ann Darrow pour son prochain film qui doit se dérouler à Skull Island, à l'est de Sumatra. Inexplorée, l'île abriterait une divinité mystérieuse vénérée par les indigènes. Après un difficile voyage en mer, l'équipe du tournage débarque. Très vite, Ann est enlevé par des cannibales puis offerte en sacrifice à Kong, un singe gigantesque.

programme.title: Boule et Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: Quadragénaire, Cal vit depuis vingt-cinq ans avec sa femme Emily, qui lui a donné deux beaux enfants. Sa vie bascule le jour où il apprend que cette dernière l'a trompé. Cal décide de divorcer et devient un homme solitaire. Dans un bar, il rencontre Jacob, un séducteur professionnel qui accumule les conquêtes. Il accepte de prendre Cal sous son aile et de le transformer en don juan. Les résultats ne se font pas attendre.

programme.title: Ma vie en l'air
programme.desc: Yann, trentenaire célibataire et instructeur dans une compagnie aérienne, a une peur panique de l'avion depuis que sa mère est morte au cours d'un vol, en le mettant au monde. Traînant cette phobie comme un fardeau, il multiplie depuis les échecs sentimentaux en compagnie de Ludo, son meilleur ami. Mais l'existence de Yann va bientôt basculer avec l'arrivée d'Alice, sa charmante nouvelle voisine.

programme.title: L'ivresse du pouvoir
programme.desc: Jeanne Charmant-Killman, juge à Paris, instruit une délicate affaire touchant aux milieux politiques et industriels. D'emblée, elle fait incarcérer pour détournement de fonds Michel Humeau, le président d'un puissant groupe industriel public qu’elle commence à interroger avec acharnement. Comme les autres personnes impliquées, Humeau reste muet. Jeanne se voit adjoindre une seconde magistrate avec qui elle travaille en bonne intelligence. Bientôt, les pressions pour la stopper vont s'intensifiant. Jeanne, incorruptible, se sent de plus en plus menacée.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Marwen
programme.desc: Pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale, le capitaine Hogie sort in extremis de son avion qui vient de s'écraser dans la campagne belge. Il est bientôt encerclé par des soldats allemands avant d'être sauvé par un commando de jeunes femmes lourdement armées. Mais le capitaine Hogie, ses ennemis et ses sauveuses sont des poupées que Mark Hogencamp manipule et photographie image par image dans son jardin. Cette activité est une forme de thérapie pour l'homme, qui s'est retrouvé amnésique après avoir été violemment agressé par cinq hommes.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: Katherine Newbury, une présentatrice de talk show, est entourée d'auteurs masculins qu'elle tyrannise. Brad, son adjoint, lui conseille d'engager une plume féminine. Ce sera la positive Molly, d'origine indienne et dont l'unique expérience est d'écrire des blagues pour ses collègues d'un complexe chimique. Surnommée "huit" par sa nouvelle patronne, Molly fait ce qu'elle peut pour s'imposer. Entre-temps, la patronne de la chaîne annonce à Katherine qu'elle sera bientôt débarquée du show. Avec Molly et son équipe, celle-ci réussit à créer à nouveau le buzz autour de l'émission.

programme.title: Nicky Larson Private Eyes
programme.desc: Au cours d'une de ses missions en plein coeur du quartier animé de Shinjuku, à Tokyo, Nicky Larson est pris dans une fusillade qui sème destruction et confusion aux alentours. Au même moment, Frank Carter, le père d'Iris Woods meurt dans un étrange accident de voiture. La jeune femme, qui se sent depuis menacée, fait appel à l'agence de Nicky et Laura pour assurer sa sécurité. La jeune femme, célèbre top model, emmène les deux détectives à l'une de ses séances de photo. C'est là qu'il croisent le chemin de Christopher King, patron de la florissante société Dominatech. Mais King est également un ancien camarade de collège de Laura.

programme.title: La princesse de Montpensier
programme.desc: En 1562, le roi Charles IX gouverne la France et les guerres de religion font rage. Marie de Mézières, amoureuse d'Henri, duc de Guise, est contrainte par son père d'épouser le prince de Montpensier. Son mari, appelé par le roi à rejoindre la guerre contre les protestants, la laisse en compagnie de son précepteur, le comte de Chabannes, loin du monde, au château de Champigny. La jeune femme, qui ne parvient pas à oublier le duc de Guise, devient malgré elle l’enjeu de passions auxquelles vient se mêler un autre soupirant, le duc d’Anjou, futur Henri III.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing Fung et Tung Cheuk Man, deux brillants officiers artificiers de la police de Hongkong, sont appelés sur de périlleuses opérations de déminage. A cours de l'une d'entre elles, Shing Fung se trouve pris dans le feu d'une violente explosion, le laissant amputé d'une jambe. Désormais aidé d'une prothèse et déterminé à retrouver sa mobilité, Poon suit un programme sportif intensif, mais quitte la police. Cinq ans plus tard, un jeune homme muni d'une ceinture d'explosif commet un attentat meurtrier dans un immeuble de la ville. Selon toute vraisemblance, il appartient à un mouvement terroriste.

programme.title: Mississippi Grind
programme.desc: Quand il n'écoute pas dans sa voiture des enregistrements contenant des conseils de professionnels du poker, Gerry, lui-même joueur qui traverse une mauvaise passe, écume les salles de jeu du Sud des Etats-Unis. C'est sur l'une d'entre elles qu'il croise Curtis, un jeune joueur aussi volubile que doué, qui adore raconter nombre d'anecdotes pendant qu'il joue. Quelques heures après leur partie, les deux hommes se retrouvent dans un bar pour échanger sur leurs expériences. Gerry est vite fasciné par le côté imprévisible dans le jeu de Curtis.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara, Evie, Roxanne, Amy et Birdie suivent les conseils de Rae pour mettre au point un plan solide pour s'emparer d'un collier qui vaut près de 16 millions de dollars.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Evie et ses comparses découvrent qu'elles ont finalement été doublées, un mystérieux voleur s'est emparé du collier. En outre, la police est sur leurs traces.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Mexico est depuis six jours le théâtre d'enlèvements d'enfants de parents fortunés. L'industriel Samuel Ramos et sa femme Lisa engagent alors John Creasy, ancien agent de la CIA, pour assurer la protection rapprochée de Pita, leur fillette de 9 ans. Creasy tolère à peine cet enfant précoce, qui ne cesse de l'interroger sur sa vie. Mais, peu à peu, il apprend à l'apprécier. Pita est enlevée. Creasy se lance dans une vendetta.

programme.title: Life in a Year
programme.desc: Daryn est à une année charnière de sa vie. Très surveillé par son père Xavier, le jeune homme, en dernière année de lycée, se concentre sur ses études et candidate à Harvard. C'est en se rendant à un concert avec ses meilleurs amis Sammy et Kiran qu'il fait la connaissance d'Isabelle, très libre, en tout point différente de lui. Alors que Daryn est immédiatement séduit par Isabelle, la jeune femme, qui a plus conscience de ce qui les sépare, se montre plutôt distante. Pourtant, à force d'obstination, Daryn parvient à se rapprocher d'elle.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Caméléon domestique, Rango est tout sauf aventurier. Le hasard lui joue un mauvais tour et il se retrouve perdu au beau milieu du désert. Après avoir échappé de peu à un aigle, il fait la connaissance de Fève, une femelle lézard. Celle-ci vient d'une petite ville du Far West, Poussière, où elle emmène son nouvel ami. Rango décide de s'y faire passer pour un héros et impressionne les habitants, bien aidé par un heureux concours de circonstances. John, la vieille tortue maire du village, le nomme alors shérif. Il doit enquêter sur la pénurie d'eau qui assèche la ville.

programme.title: Toute ressemblance...
programme.desc: Alors que, traversant une mauvaise passe, il est poursuivi par des paparazzi sous le pont de l'Alma, Cédric Saint Guérande, le plus célèbre présentateur de journal télévisé de France, repense à ses débuts, 18 ans plus tôt, quand le fade Jean-Charles Balin tenait son poste et que Cédric travaillait dans on ombre. Il se souvient du moment où son destin bascule, le 11 septembre 2001, quand il se retrouve à la place de Balin devant les caméras pour présenter le journal télévisé. Pour Cédric, c'est le début d'une irrésistible ascension.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: Sécurité rapprochée
programme.desc: Employé de la CIA, Matt Weston est chargé de surveiller un des locaux secrets de l'agence au Cap, en Afrique du Sud. Lassé du peu d'intérêt de sa mission, il aspire à plus de responsabilités. Au même moment, Tobin Frost, ex-agent accusé de vendre des renseignements confidentiels, est arrêté non loin de là. Il est conduit dans la planque que surveille Matt. Bientôt, un commando armé prend le local d’assaut.

programme.title: Marie Stuart, reine d'Ecosse
programme.desc: Dans la seconde moitié du XVIe siècle, Marie Stuart, née catholique et encore enfant, est envoyée en France alors que les protestants se battent pour le contrôle de l'Ecosse. A 15 ans, elle épouse l'héritier du trône de France. A 18 ans, veuve, elle rentre dans une Ecosse dominée par les protestants et gouvernée par son demi-frère, le comte de Moray. Elisabeth est la reine protestante de l'Angleterre et Marie, qui peut légitimement prétendre au trône de par sa naissance, constitue une menace pour la reine.

programme.title: Argo
programme.desc: En 1979, lors de la prise de l'ambassade américaine à Téhéran par les révolutionnaires iraniens, soixante Américains sont pris en otage. Mais, au beau lieu du chaos, six employés parviennent à s'échapper. Ils se réfugient au domicile de l'ambassadeur canadien. Tony Mendez, agent de la CIA spécialiste de l'exfiltration, tente de trouver un plan pour les sauver. Il a l'idée de faire passer les employés pour des techniciens de cinéma venus en repérage en Iran pour tourner un film de science-fiction. Ce thriller dramatique est inspiré de faits vécus.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 On ne choisit pas sa famille

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Maman, 12 appels manqués, 6 mémos, 3 textos

programme.title: Un heureux événement
programme.desc: Etudiante en philosophie, Barbara Dray fait la connaissance de Nicolas Malle, qui travaille dans un vidéoclub. Il parvient à la séduire et ils s'installent ensemble. Lors de vacances, Nicolas convainc Barbara de faire un bébé. Un jour, la jeune femme annonce à Nicolas qu'elle est enceinte. Pendant sa grossesse, Barbara passe par tous les états. Et vient enfin le jour de l'accouchement, qui se déroule sans encombre. Mais c'est le début d'une véritable détresse pour Barbara, qui ne parvient pas à se faire à cette nouvelle vie.

programme.title: Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.sub-title: S1 E8 Le flux et le reflux

programme.title: Soupçons
programme.desc: Les enquêteurs sont certains que Florent a tué sa femme à la suite d'une dispute. De plus, Florent refuse de nommer sa maîtresse, ce qui aggrave son cas. Cependant, les policiers manquent de preuves matérielles pour l'incriminer, notamment l'arme du crime. Le procureur décide de le relâcher. Victoire, de son côté, est victime d'un maître-chanteur. Après lui avoir remis de l'argent, elle le poursuit et fait un malaise cardiaque. C'est le père de Marion qui la prend en charge. Victoire est bien obligée d'avouer au docteur qu'elle est enceinte.

programme.title: Soupçons
programme.desc: Les policiers ont désormais la preuve matérielle que Florent est le meurtrier de sa femme. Ils le recherchent activement tout en essayant de découvrir l'identité de sa maîtresse. Les images d'une caméra de vidéosurveillance les mettent sur la piste. En cavale, Florent essaie à tout prix de prouver son innocence. Il contacte Victoire à l'insu de son époux et lui demande de l'aider. Victoire, de son côté, parvient à démasquer son maître-chanteur et à récupérer son argent. Dans le même temps, elle fait une découverte importante sur la victime.

programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Driver
programme.desc: Alors qu'elle sort d'un casino, une joueuse est témoin de la fuite de deux gangsters poursuivis par la police. Grâce à la virtuosité du chauffeur, les malfrats parviennent à s'enfuir.

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion)

programme.title: True Blood
True Blood
True Blood
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis","dateCreated":"2009-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Show Does The Impossible","reviewBody":"When using superlatives with this show it is totally fair. This show does something all other movies, shows, etc cannot do: it can safely apply any genre and still function as a deep and very entertaining show. As everybody episode goes by the show only becomes more addictive. It taps into almost every aspect of life. Every emotion is shown; love, hate, forgiveness, triumph and the list goes on and on. In fact this show depicts life the most realistically. The strangeness and peculiarity of the many themes perfectly displays the confusion in life and how it affects us. The show displays confusion in the clearest way making it almost impossible not to some how relate to the characters in the show. Not to mention also the series ends on one finest note you will ever see not just satisfying the viewer but taking the show to a level far and above anything else I have ever seen before. This show does the impossible twice over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"morphion2","dateCreated":"2005-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Complete First Season Review - Superb","reviewBody":"Screenwriter Alan Ball is most well-known for his 1999 film debut American Beauty (directed by another first-timer, England's Sam Mendes). His first work was a stunning success, captivating audiences all over the world and winning five Academy Awards. In 2001, the pilot for Ball's first television series Six Feet Under aired. While being considerably darker than audiences might have expected, the series soon found its fan base and secured a place in the list of all time greats.

The show revolves around the Fishers, a rather isolated and dysfunctional family who run their own independent funeral home, and whose eldest son Nate (Peter Krause) is reunited with them in the wake of his father's untimely death. Once he is home, Nate learns that he has inherited the family business with his gay brother David (Michael C. Hall) and he has to learn how to again become a part of this bizarre family. Meanwhile, David, we learn, is struggling to reconcile his homosexuality with his home-taught Christian values, while his younger sister Claire (Lauren Ambrose) is forced to battle the hell of adolescence and the children's mother Ruth (Frances Conroy), a deeply devoted mother and wife, has to learn to face life without her husband. The complete first season sees the growth of the Fisher family as they slowly begin to disband their isolation and seek comfort, support and love from one another in the face of hardships and tragedy.

Six Feet Under is what every show should strive to be  it is intelligent, witty, sincere, realistic and completely unashamed to show the dark, painful side of life, without being depressing or nihilistic. It deals with an unfathomable amount of very significant issues, but on such a personal and relatable level that it doesn't even begin to feel preachy or self-important. It explores society's position on gays, women, young people, the elderly, the mentally ill and looks very openly at religion and death. A series of this standard is a surprise even from the production company that brought us Angels in America and The Sopranos.

One of the most fundamental principles for engaging an audience is to present engaging characters. Six Feet Under is a prime example: each character we're introduced to does take some getting used to, but all are wonderfully rich and complex and three-dimensional, balanced nicely by each other. Not only the Fishers but all their friends, acquaintances and lovers are well-developed, highly-involved and important to the show in its many layers. Nate's girlfriend Brenda (Rachael Griffiths) and her manic-depressive brother Billy (Jeremy Sisto), David's boyfriend Keith (Mathew St. Patrick) and the Fishers' Puerto Rican employee Rico (Freddy Rodriguez) are all fantastic characters that do far more than just complement the show's funeral home family.

Alan Ball is a truly gifted writer and an even more amazing artist; his ability to create such a delightfully unique environment and then to build on that environment to such incredible heights is nothing short of genius. His signature style of dark humor is one of the best things about Six Feet Under; even in a show about such somber and sometimes even morbid material, laughter is not uncommon, as he is able to recognize that there is more to life than pain. Ball has, within 2 short years, proved that he is one of Hollywood's most talented minds, and we can all look forward to further work from him.

More than any other television series in history, Six Feet Under is able to connect with its audience on a raw and emotional level that makes the sentimental soap operas of prime time television look like badly acted school plays. Joining the ranks of the most intelligent and heartfelt shows of today, it can rest assured that it will be remembered in the world of tomorrow as one of the most innovative and poignant shows of all time.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128011,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0120570, Title: From the Earth to the Moon, --- Description: From the Earth to the Moon: With Tom Hanks, Nick Searcy, Lane Smith, David Andrews. Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0120570/","name":"From the Earth to the Moon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTM4ODctMWUxYi00NDZhLWJhNGEtNzA3MGE4MWY4N2E2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120570/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Dylan-36","dateCreated":"2000-01-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"The definitive chronical of the Space Race...","reviewBody":"When taking in the whole of the series, after viewing, I cannot help but be overwhelmed by a sense of awe. Awe at what man has accomplished, awe at the ingeinuity and the diligence that it took for us to take the mighty and unbelievable step as the journey from the earth to the moon.

Tom Hanks' series can only be characterized as the definitive chronical of the space race. Given enough time to properly dissipate the stories, enough talent to portray, and enough insight and intrigue to be accurate, he has put together episode after episode of historically credible and entertaining accounting of this.

Part 1, entitled "Can We Do This?" captures the feeling of overwhelming that America experienced when faced with the daunting task of actually landing on the moon. This episode provides a fitting prologue to the remainder of the series. The second episode, "Apollo 1" is perhaps the first real disection and discussion of the fire that tragically took the lives of astronauts Gus Grissom, Roger Chaffee, and Ed White. (Look for an excellent recounting of the fire itself as told through the narration of Frank Borman...

Perhaps the most well produced episodes are some of the later episodes: Recounting of missions that are easily forgotten in the wake of their more powerful predeccessors. Overall, this series is one of the great treasures of the 1990's, and one of the crown jewels in Tom Hanks illustrious career.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11807,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"1998-04-05","keywords":"neil armstrong character,astronomical object in title,moon,space program,apollo 8","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780678/","name":"Nick Searcy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809031/","name":"Lane Smith"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005677/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007966/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"From The Earth To The Moon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi900006169","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNjM2FiZjAtZDdlMy00N2UzLWI1NjMtN2Y0Mzg3MzkwMDljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNjM2FiZjAtZDdlMy00N2UzLWI1NjMtN2Y0Mzg3MzkwMDljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The
Der Club der toten Mütter
programme.desc:
The (Dead Mothers) Club: Directed by Katie Green, Carlye Rubin. With Hope Edelman, Jane Fonda, Letitia Guimaraes-Lyle, Jordyn Levine. Three women bound by the shared experience of having lost their mothers during adolescence yet whose paths never cross." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2328773/","name":"The (Dead Mothers) Club","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MzYzMzkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTgzMzU1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women bound by the shared experience of having lost their mothers during adolescence yet whose paths never cross.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2328773/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"StevePulaski"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A bold opportunity showing loss and self-reflection (and a certain amount of self-motivation)","reviewBody":""It's like a club; you're initiated, you're in a club - it is not going away." - Rosie O'Donnell, The (Dead Mothers) Club.

The (Dead Mothers) Club premieres on HBO the day after Mother's Day in America, an airdate that is likely not a coincidence. I always rolled my eyes at all the "lonely" and "depressed" singles on Valentine's Day that would gripe about spending the day eating their hearts out or spending time in solidarity. Some people don't have mothers on Mother's Day, fathers on Father's Day, or grandparents on Grandparents Day, and you really want to blog about your issues with being single on a contrived day where elements of marketing and guilt dominate? Spare me.

The (Dead Mothers) Club is a documentary that will make you grateful to have your mother in your life or comforted through relatability by people who share your position if you don't. Despite headlining familiar names such as Jane Fonda, Rosie O'Donnell, and Molly Shannon, celebrities whose mothers died when they were all young, the film sets its main focus on common-people, one ready for college, another raising her young child, who have experienced tragedy with the lack of a female parental force to care for them.

One of the girls is Leticia, a clearly strong woman, whose mother died from a rare genetic mutation. Leticia is in the middle of raising a very young daughter when a test finds that she also had the rare mutation and that the flawed gene has spread throughout every cell in her body. She now has to put up the same fight her mother did and lost. Another girl we center on is Ginger, a wise, artistic young woman, who loves reflecting on her mother's personality and sensibilities. Her mother always worried because she was an art student that she'd never get the work she truly deserved. Ginger has found great success at painting and crafting stacking dolls and uses that as her means of income.

Finally, there's Jordyn, who is ready to enter college. A smart, beautiful young woman, she is definitely one of the most precocious teenage girls I've seen in a while, moved by legacy and persistency rather than impulsive behavior. She struggles to make the right decision about college without her mother's input.

Fonda, O'Donnell, and Shannon pop up every now and then to talk about their mother's impact and how their death affected them. Fonda's mom killed herself when she was twelve, and Fonda lived with that grief until she was sixty-four, when she realized it wasn't her fault after all. O'Donnell's mom died when she was ten, while Shannon's died in a car accident when she was only four.

Directresses Katie Green and Carlye Rubin refrain from milking sentimentality out of these stories, which is an element I've seen thankfully lacking in HBO documentaries. Despite films that bear titles and topics (IE: grief camps for children and a veteran in prison for life embracing his final days to name a few) that almost instantly make one tear up, these documentaries nicely avoid the sappier elements and exploiting certain situations emotionally.

It's often that I casually fault HBO's short documentaries for not being long enough and stating that many of them could easily be of feature length; The (Dead Mothers) Club, which runs at seventy minutes, give or take, could've easily been just as successful in its message with about thirty minutes trimmed off. The film begins to run circles around its ideas, and while we learn about the stories of the film's main characters, there's not much else we can say other than these are fine young women who are growing up without mothers and are likely going to make interesting, well-developed people. What about the young males who lack the female sensitivity and guidance in their lives? What about those who have become emotionally troubled without their mother in their life? 

If The (Dead Mothers) Club had to be seventy minutes in length, horizons could've been broadened and alternate routes could've been taken to give more thematic resonance to these stories other than having the audience recognize that they are indeed unfortunate. However, because it takes a necessary topic and fuels it was material and substance that isn't directly geared to exploit its subjects and the sentiment at hand, (and, in turn, winds up being very personal and often moving) the film does possess considerable merit.

NOTE: The (Dead Mothers) Club will air throughout the month of May 2014 on HBO.

Starring: Jane Fonda, Rosie O'Donnell, and Molly Shannon. Directed by: Katie Green and Carlye Rubin.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":165,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2014-05-12","keywords":"motherless daughter","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976662/","name":"Hope Edelman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000404/","name":"Jane Fonda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8849337/","name":"Letitia Guimaraes-Lyle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976719/","name":"Katie Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2809929/","name":"Carlye Rubin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0375529/"}],"duration":"PT1H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0809497, Title: Tell Me You Love Me, --- Description: Tell Me You Love Me: Created by Cynthia Mort. With Michelle Borth, Tim DeKay, Aislinn Paul, Adam Scott. A drama about three couples and the therapist they share." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0809497/","name":"Tell Me You Love Me","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThlNWY4MGYtNjQ4NS00NDEzLTg2MGMtNWZjOTU2NTM3Y2QzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about three couples and the therapist they share.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0809497/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blmcfarlane","dateCreated":"2007-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really new","reviewBody":"I like this a lot. Very new pace, daring way to go about telling stories. I am a big fan of this style,I think it is riveting and relevant to life, just my kind of thing. God I love to see sex that seems somewhat real. Good writing, true, insightful, fresh. GREAT ACTING!!! Ally Walker is brilliant, had these moment where I just sat with my mouth open, I knew exactly the inexpressible conflicting place she was at. All the choices were subtle, very right, exactly catching the moments of marriage and the pain. The pilot also was brilliantly directed, so quirky and confident. Not surprising coming from a woman who directed "I Heard the Mermaids Singing" Bravo Patricia! It is a show that seems to cash in on honest and patient Canadian integrity while remaining thoroughly entertaining. Note, give it more than 10 minutes before you decide it's not for you. Hope it manages to last- it is a bit risky, not what we're used to. Also, I'm not sure it will appeal to everyone, a little worrisome that I like it so much but I also am a big fan of Six Feet Under, Gray's Anatomy, House and Entourage (but I also liked John from Cincinatti) so who knows?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3702,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-09-09","keywords":"love,sex scene,husband wife relationship,nudity,family relationships","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218924/","name":"Michelle Borth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215229/","name":"Tim DeKay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1327832/","name":"Aislinn Paul"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226614/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607725/","name":"Cynthia Mort"]</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0809497, Title: Tell Me You Love Me, --- Description: Tell Me You Love Me: Created by Cynthia Mort. With Michelle Borth, Tim DeKay, Aislinn Paul, Adam Scott. A drama about three couples and the therapist they share." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0809497/","name":"Tell Me You Love Me","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThlNWY4MGYtNjQ4NS00NDEzLTg2MGMtNWZjOTU2NTM3Y2QzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about three couples and the therapist they share.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0809497/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blmcfarlane","dateCreated":"2007-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really new","reviewBody":"I like this a lot. Very new pace, daring way to go about telling stories. I am a big fan of this style,I think it is riveting and relevant to life, just my kind of thing. God I love to see sex that seems somewhat real. Good writing, true, insightful, fresh. GREAT ACTING!!! Ally Walker is brilliant, had these moment where I just sat with my mouth open, I knew exactly the inexpressible conflicting place she was at. All the choices were subtle, very right, exactly catching the moments of marriage and the pain. The pilot also was brilliantly directed, so quirky and confident. Not surprising coming from a woman who directed "I Heard the Mermaids Singing" Bravo Patricia! It is a show that seems to cash in on honest and patient Canadian integrity while remaining thoroughly entertaining. Note, give it more than 10 minutes before you decide it's not for you. Hope it manages to last- it is a bit risky, not what we're used to. Also, I'm not sure it will appeal to everyone, a little worrisome that I like it so much but I also am a big fan of Six Feet Under, Gray's Anatomy, House and Entourage (but I also liked John from Cincinatti) so who knows?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3702,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-09-09","keywords":"love,sex scene,husband wife relationship,nudity,family relationships","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218924/","name":"Michelle Borth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215229/","name":"Tim DeKay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1327832/","name":"Aislinn Paul"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226614/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607725/","name":"Cynthia Mort"]</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman","dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion)

programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="
